text: Jack Low was an Australian lawn bowls international who competed in the 1938 British Empire Games. ==Bowls career== At the 1938 British Empire Games he won the bronze medal in the singles event. He was the 1938 National singles runner-up when bowling for the Belmont Bowls Club in New South Wales. He previously bowled for the Lithgow Bowls Club. ==References== Category:Australian male bowls players Category:Bowls players at the 1938 British Empire Games Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Australia Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
title: Jack Low
